wtf is with the dragon crap, and are all those in pic all the real ones??

He didn’t make it.

Codeusa is one of those leeching faggots.

cause my dragons are shexy

Yeah i did not make the dragon i made it look cooler
[/quote]

No you didn’t, you’re a fucking faggot.[/quote]

Oh yes give me that dick, i want it in me. Really did you have to call me a fagot? I said i did not make them just made it look retarded but anyway… You are immature.

item.title: Barrows Remaking(NPC)
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

100% by me!
File modified: Class5.java

What this do?
This make barrows alive =) (they are not pink they like if they wield barrows armor)

How to do it?
Search for

class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);

And under it add this

if(i == 2029){ class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[9]; class5.anIntArray76 = new int[3]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[3]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 0xD4E7;
